name: Prowlarr
description: Indexer manager for Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and Readarr. Centralized indexer management.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  prowlarr:
    image: lscr.io/linuxserver/prowlarr:latest
    container_name: prowlarr
    environment:
      - PUID={{PUID}}
      - PGID={{PGID}}
      - TZ={{TZ}}
    volumes:
      - {{CONFIG_PATH}}:/config
    ports:
      - 9696:9696
    restart: unless-stopped
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=prowlarr"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=automation"

notes: Central indexer management for all *arr applications
Sync indexers automatically to Sonarr, Radarr, etc.
